hasDitaContent.@value: Both midazolam and zolpidem can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in Guidance on Prescribing).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  midazolam  and  zolpidem  can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in  Guidance on Prescribing ).
